author: ETA PRIME
description:
Turn your Windows 11 desktop or laptop into an Xbox-style living room console.
In this video I show you how to enable Xbox Full Screen Experience Mode (FSE) on any compatible Windows 11 machine using the Xbox Insider Hub, and then test RAM usage and performance in real games. We’ll walk through the full setup step-by-step, from joining the right Insider channels to configuring Full Screen Experience to auto-launch on startup. Then I’ll jump into some real-world testing with a desktop and a laptop to see how much RAM it actually saves and whether there’s any real performance gain in games like Cyberpunk 2077.

Learn More Here: https://blogs.windows.com/windows-insider/2025/11/21/full-screen-experience-expands-to-more-windows-11-pc-form-factors-for-windows-insiders/

Follow Me On Twitter: https://twitter.com/theetaprime
Follow Me On Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/etaprime/
